name: DARKWATER CHRONICLES - CHAPTER 1: In Search of BigFoot
blurb: Test your nerves and skill through solo investigations and lock-downs all over the world in this first-person paranormal game series.

rewards.reward:
Supporter

============================== 
Thank you for your support! You have our deepest gratitude and we'll work even harder to deliver the best game possible. We invite you to join the DARKWATER CHRONICLES, where you will be identified as a Kickstarter Supporter, and able discuss the game with the community.

==============================

Trusted Source 

============================== 
Includes a digital download of the game.

============================== 
Includes Supporter Level Rewards

Junior Agent

============================== 
Includes a digital download of the game, and closed BETA Access. 

============================== 
Includes Supporter Level Rewards

Agent 1ST Class 
============================== 
Be the first to experience the game with access to the Early Bird ALPHA! 

==============================
Includes Junior Agent Level Rewards

Field Agent 

============================== 
Only available during Kickstarter. Includes access to developer art and exclusive content in the Field AGENT area on the forums. 

============================== 
Includes Agent 1st Class Level Rewards

Special Agent

============================== 
Receive downloadable copies of the following: the making-of DARK CHRONICLES documentary, "DARKWATER CHRONICLES - CHAPTER 1: In Search Of BigFoot" the OST, and the art book. 

============================== 
Includes Field Agent Level Rewards

Special Ops 

============================== 
Receive an additional downloadable copy of the game! A great way to bring in a friend to join you on your quest! 

============================== 
Includes Special Agent Level Rewards

Team Commander

============================== 
Only available during Kickstarter. Receive official serialized DARKWATER AGENT ID Card and have your name listed in the special thanks area of the game credits! 

============================== 
Includes Special Ops Level Rewards

Director

==============================
We'll ship you a physical Collector's Edition of the game! This includes DVD versions of the game along with the helpful game guide, "DARKWATER CHRONICLES - Chapter 1: In Search Of BigFoot" mini-novel, and the OST CD! 

============================== 
Includes Team Commander Level Rewards

Committee Member

============================== 
Physical copy of the limited edition art book, features all art in game, including early concept art.

============================== 
Includes Director Level Rewards

Committee Speaker 

============================== 
A bound physical signed copy of the musical score for the game's main theme (printed in A4).

============================== 
Includes Committee Member Level Rewards

Board Member 

============================== 
Gain access to private Developer Discussions/Forums, access to the most current developer build (build access will begin November 2013) and assist our team on game development choices. You will receive official DARKWATER dog-tags, and your name will be listed as a Developer in the game's credits. Your Collector's Edition box will be signed by the creator and lead designer of the DARKWATER CHRONICLES Series! 

============================== 
Includes Committee Speaker Level Rewards

Chairperson

============================== 
You will be listed as a producer in the credits.

============================== 
Includes Board Member Level Rewards

Talent

============================== 
Your name and voice will be used in the game as part of the in-game dialogue. You will also be listed under CO-STARRING in the credits!

============================== 
Includes Board Member Level Rewards

Star 

============================== 
Your name will be in the game along with a 3D model in your likeness. You will be part of the interview process and have minor dialogue. You will be listed under STARRING in the credits and receive special thanks plaque!

==============================
Includes Board Member Level Rewards

Super Star 

============================== 
Your name will be in the game along with a 3D model in your likeness. You will be the key interviewee and have major dialogue. You will be listed under FEATURING in the credits receive special thanks plaque!

==============================
Includes Board Member Level Rewards
